text: Ezɨ, gumazir dapanir Ahap Mikaia iniasa amadazɨ ghuzim, an a inigha izi. Aning atrivim boroghɨn iza, gumazir dapanir kam Mikaia mɨgɨa ghaze, “Akam inigha izir gumaziba bar moghɨra ghaze, atrivim mɨdorozimɨn Siriaba abɨragham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ uaghan kamaghɨra, akar atrivim bar akueghamin tamɨn atrivim mɨkɨm.”
